string.value: A mysterious potion created through Alchemy. Use it to become invincible for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious potion created through Alchemy. Increases EXP by 10% for 2 hours. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time, but alchemists may use up to 2 at once.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious potion created through Alchemy. Increases item and meso drop rate by 10% for 2 hours. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time, but alchemists may use up to 2 at once.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 3x Giant Potion received after defeating the Giant Moon Bunny. What mysterious powers could it hold? \n#c* Caution: Use might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A 5x Giant Potion received after defeating the Giant Moon Bunny. What mysterious powers could it hold? \n#c* Caution: Use might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion brewed by a very paranoid witch on Hallow's Eve. Makes you invincible for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Resistance Potion made to celebrate the year of the dragon. Abnormal Status Resistance +10% for 2 hours on use. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time,

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases STR, DEX, INT, and LUK by 30, and Speed by 30, and Jump by 23 for 2 hours. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases ATT and M. ATT by 12 and can be used with other ATT potions. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that makes the imbiber invincible for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases item and meso drop rates by 10% for 2 hours. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases EXP gains by 10% for 2 hours. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious potion that contains the power of Chronos, a god of the ancient Giants. What mysterious powers does it hold? \n#c* Caution: Using it might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion dropped by the Rhinojinn. Increases STR, DEX, INT, LUK, Speed, and Jump by 20 for 1 hour. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion dropped by the Rhinojinn. Increases ATT & M. ATT by 4 for 15 minutes. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion dropped by the Rhinojinn. Increases MAX HP by 2000 for 1 hour. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion that blesses the chosen. Increases STR, DEX, INT, LUK, Speed, and Jump by 10 for 1 hour. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing from Cassandra. Weapon/Magic ATT +10, Weapon/Magic DEF +150, Accuracy/Avoidability +100, Movement Speed +7, and Jump +5 for 30 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing from Cassandra. Weapon/Magic ATT +10, Weapon/Magic DEF +150, Accuracy/Avoidability +100, Movement Speed +7, and Jump +5 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A healing tonic made with Edmund's secret recipe. Just the thing when you're feeling under the weather! [Restores 50% of HP and MP, also gives +14 W. Att + 30 M.Att, for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A jewel crafted by Prendergast for his daughter, intended as a protective gift for her 16th birthday.

null.name: [Restores all HP/MP, +50 Weapon Defense, +50 Magic Defense for 10 minutes. 5 uses.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiger balm. Made from tigers. Weapon/Magic ATT +20, Weapon/Magic DEF +400, Accuracy/Avoidability +200, and Movement Speed/Jump +10 for 1 hour.

null.name: [Gives +60 Weapon Attack, +60 Speed, +60 Avoidability for 1 minute]

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiger pill. Made from tigers. Weapon/Magic ATT +10, Weapon/Magic DEF +150, Accuracy/Avoidability +100, and Movement Speed/Jump 3 for 20 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restore 1200HP, 1200MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is lime-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 HP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is grape-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is orange-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600HP, 600MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: A mouth-watering, delectable sweet treat! [Gives +100 Accuracy for 1 minute]

string.name: desc
string.value: A small note written by Tae Roon. This note is enchanted, so it boosts weapon attack and magic attack by 3 for 1 minute.

string.name: desc
string.value: Delicious mushroom candy from Sen. This candy makes anyone feel good about themselves. So good, that it boosts Jump +3 for 3 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pieces of pumpkin left over from making halloween Jack-o'-Lanterns. The pumpkin, perfectly ripe, has an aroma that is sweeter than ever. Each piece recovers 50 HP and 50 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A candy wrapped in stripes. Kids love it. Recovers 20 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Received a mysterious power from the Glowing Rock. Boosts the weapon attack and magic attack slightly for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small hole is up on the top of the Coconut, where the straw goes in. Drink the juice with the straw for maximum refreshment. Recovers 100 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red crystal with a mysterious power packed in. Attack +5 for 5 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue crystal fragment filled with mysterious power. Accuracy +100 for 5 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious scoop of stuffing. This treat comes around only once in a while so eat it up before it gets cold. \n[Restores 600 HP/ 600 MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: This delicious cranberry sauce complements almost any meal! \n[Gives + 30 Magic Attack for 3 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: It looks like someone dropped this potato. \n[Restores 800 HP]

string.name: desc
string.value: The only thing better than a gravy boat is a gravy train. \n[Restores 800 MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fist used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts weapon and magic attack.

string.name: desc
string.value: A set of wings used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts speed and jump.

string.name: desc
string.value: An eyeball-rotating skull used during the Hunting Tournament. Inverts directions.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious looking Christmas Ham with a sprig of mistletoe on top.\nRecovers 3000 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: The traditional Versalmas dinner. Smells... like fish. \nRecovers 2385 HP and 3791 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cheese from the alternate dimension of Versal. Looks funny but smells quite nice. \nGives +220 Magic Attack for 2 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value: Olives frosted with pink sugar -- a special treat beloved by children from Versal! \nGives +40 Speed and + 25 Jump for 5 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: O-Pongo's favorite treat! Creamy caramel with a crunchy onion center! \nRestores 800 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crispy wafer layered with chocolate creme. \nGives +40 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value: SPF 1000. Blocks all harmful rays, including magical ones. \nGives +200 Magic Defense for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of cake that consists of snow-white whipped cream and cherry. Recovers 300 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A string of Chinese firecrackers known to scare away ghoulish spirits.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fiery black liquid that gives the user the power of a thousand demons when consumed. [Gives +140 Weapon Attack for 8 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking the swirling blue liquid within this small iron pot fills the user with an energy that emanates a protective aura. [Gives +100 Overall Defense, +200 Magic Attack for 10 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: John Barricade's special concoction, used to get him out of tight jams. For use in emergencies! [Gives +50 Avoidability, +50 Accuracy, +10 Jump for 5 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A power scream from Maple Admin. Weapon attack +8, Magic attack +12 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe. Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek! [Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Spread all over the Maple World for the 4th anniversary of MapleStory, this note contains the prizes that you'll win when this is found.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked! [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: It's the absolute truth, but it really hurts. It might be better to not know the truth, for what you don't know can't hurt you. Provides WEAPON ATT +10 and MAGIC ATT +8 in your enraged state, but you suffer -50 MP for mental trauma.

string.name: desc
string.value: What you don't know can't hurt you. If the truth is too much to handle, avoiding it may be wise. It provides Critical +10 in your consideration for others, but you suffer -80 HP because of the anxiety that comes after telling a lie.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ancient glacial water collected from the Ice Cliff in El Nath. It never freezes no matter how cold it gets and has the ability to restore the health of Hoblins.\nRestores Shammos's health.

string.value: A gift for the masters of the Fossil Museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift for the masters of the Fossil Museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift for the supporters of the Fossil Museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a fish for the Marine Museum that you raised on your own. Double-click to check the content.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a fruit for the Fruit Museum that you raised on your own. Double-click to check the content.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a fossil for the Fossil Museum that you cultured on your own. Double-click to check the content.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a fish for the Marine Museum in a fishbowl. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a fruit for the Fruit Museum that you plucked from a tree. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a fossil for the Fossil Museum that was excavated from a crystal pillar. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains an ordinary fish for the Marine Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains an ordinary fruit for the Fruit Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains an ordinary fossil for the Fossil Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a great fish for the Marine Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a sparkling fruit for the Fruit Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a primal fossil for the Fossil Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: Upgrades Weapon ATT/Magic ATT Buff effects and EXP Bonus when used in conjunction with a Basic Value Pack. Duration can purchased in 1 day intervals. \n#cWorks immediately upon purchase. Only affects EXP Bonus and Weapon ATT/Magic Buff.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious scent permeates the air. Those who smelt it will receive a 10% increase to Max HP for 15 min. Those who dealt it will pretend like they got the buff and then make a joke about their dog.

string.name: desc
string.value: Refreshingly delightful. Those who smell the Floral Scent will receive a 10% increase to Max Mana for 15 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dedication to fine clothes grants Weapon ATT and Magic ATT +30 for 2 hr.

string.name: desc
string.value: This book opens up into a dimension made up entirely of scrolls. It's way better than the dimension made up of poisonous flip-flops. Use to receive one random Weapon Scroll.

string.name: desc
string.value: This book opens up into a dimension made up entirely of scrolls. It's way better than the dimension made up of poisonous flip-flops. Use to receive one random Armor Scroll.

string.name: desc
string.value: This book opens up into a dimension made up entirely of scrolls. It's way better than the dimension made up of poisonous flip-flops. Use to receive one random Accessory Scroll.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the nearest town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the dark Kerning City.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to Sleepywood, a quiet and dark forest-town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the dead mine at the higher ground of El Nath.\nCan only be used in Orbis and El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the nearest town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows you to return to the Omega Sector Command Center. Can only be used in the Ludibrium area.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows you to return to Ludibrium. Can only be used in the Ludibrium area.

string.name: desc
string.value: Warp powder made by fairy Phyllia. Teleports you to Magatia when used inside the Nihal desert region.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll enables you to return to the Pirate village, Nautilus. This is a one use item and will disappear after use.

string.name: name
string.value: Return to New Leaf City Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to venture back to New Leaf City whenever you want!

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that the Red Lion King gave to his knights. When used, you will move to the Audience Room of the Red Lion King.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows the owner of the capsule to warp to the Command Center of Omega Sector.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to move to your spouse's current map. #cDouble click# to use.\nIf your spouse is in a restricted area or you can't teleport from your current location, this stone is unusable.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that teleports you to White Wave Harbor. It will disappear once used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that returns you to Elluel. It will disappear once used.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted ticket that transports you to the Silent Crusade's Hideout. Crumbles to dust after one use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that takes you to the Dangerous Cave. Disappears when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that takes you to the Subway Ticketing Booth. Disappears when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that takes you to the Relic Excavation Camp. Disappears when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: Given upon using a Zakum Dungeon Additional Entry Ticket. Disappears once used. Only use this scroll in channels where Zakum can be summoned.

string.name: desc
string.value: Given upon using a Horntail Dungeon Additional Entry Ticket. Disappears once used. Only use this scroll in channels where Horntail can be summoned.

string.name: desc
string.value: Takes you directly to the Gold Beach Resort. Disappears after one use.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation from the Masked Man to the Halloween Party at the Haunted Mansion. Double-click to move straight to the mansion.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the studio for the event 'For Guild Only.'

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the moon, sent by the Moon Bunnies. Using this will send you directly to Moon Bunny's ????.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the baby bird's nest sent by Gaga. Use it to be sent directly to the nest.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to Ereve from Neinheart. This invitation will allow you to instantly move to Ereve.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that allows you to attend the 5th Anniversary Family Photo Shoot Event.

string.name: desc
string.value: A teleport ticket given by the Maple Admin. It will immediately teleport you to Rien.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Special Training Invitation that Ferdi, the Edelstein School Headmaster, gave you. Double-click on it to go to the classroom where the Special Training will be held.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that can teleport to El Nath. Once used, you will directly teleport to El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: A book Tae Gong found in the sea. It is written in a bizarre language you can't read. \n#cDouble-click# to go into the book.

string.name: desc
string.value: An unbelievable lamp made by Richie Gold. Use this, and you'll be led somewhere in in the maze. No one knows exactly where you'll be sent, though.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on the item to send a New Year's card to a character of your choice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: This potion, given to you by Moira, transforms you into a dragon for a while.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Blue Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Blue Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion that can transform you into Tigun the guard.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special shell only found through Mano. Apparently it's powerful enough to grant a wish...

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: desc
string.value: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Apparently it has some special powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: An abandoned doll that Sophillia threw away a long time ago, but revived by the Masked Man. Pet its hair, and you'll turn into Sophillia for 3 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into a small, cute mouse.

string.name: desc
string.value: The mysterious skills of an old halfling has transformed you into a form of a dragon. You can now fly.

string.name: desc
string.value: The more you look at it, the more you feel lightheaded and you feel closer to the moon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet, delicious rice cake. Sometimes creates an interesting set of powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment you drink this potion, you'll become the biggest star in the world of Maple, Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A transformation potion from the masked gentleman that allows you to transform into Peto for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: No one knows what you'll transform into when you drink this, but something WILL happen for one hour. It's all about the risk...

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on this to transform a character of your choice. Which one? Try it and find out!

string.value: You've entered a fable and transformed into Geppetto. You're feel a bit sluggish, but do your best to leave the dungeon with your party members.

string.name: desc
string.value: The mysterious force emanating from the crystal statue shall be absorbed into your body, and you will no longer find yourself as you are.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pheremone perfume created by Kenta. Use it to tame a Wild Pig at Korean Folk Town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch with a jewel on the surface. Possesses a special power in that double-clicking the pouch will suck up the surrounding ghosts in the area.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special alchemist tool that converts an absorbed power of monster into a jewel. The inner part seems to be slightly transparent.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cliff's magic cane. Can be used to tame a Lost Rudolph.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a special magic marble that can contain and purify a monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: The calabash Arec gave you along with the mission. When the King Sage Cat's HP is below 30%, double-click the calabash to seal the King Sage Cat inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used near aliens to take photos of them.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fish net intended to catch something. Can be used with Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A green ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A purple ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Hodori.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Hogul.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Growlie.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Tiger.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net that Robinson gave you. You can use it to catch fishes in Aqua Road.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net used for catching a Serpent that has been weakened. Double-click on it to catch a weakend Serpent.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong cage made of metal. Double-click on it to catch Eleanor's pet after it has been weakened.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rope used for catching a weakened Ribbon Pig. Double-click on it to catch the pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sack for capturing weakened Ligators. Double-click to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted bottle that can contain the essence of pure light. Double-click on it to capture weakened Spirits of Light.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted pouch that can contain the Giant Nependeath. Double-click on it to capture weakened Giant Nependeath.

string.name: desc
string.value: A score used by a ghost that appears in the Music Room. It has a total of 13 pages.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire Hero's Will.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to #cteleport to most other locations through the World Map [W]#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A capsule used for fire-elemental attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: A capsule used for ice-elemental attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Subani's sacred Scrolls. If used in conjunction with a normal or Dark Scroll, the number of item upgrade slots will not be deducted if the scroll fails. However, if using a Dark Scroll, there is still a chance that your weapon will be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Used to expand your Character Slots in the #ccurrent world# by #c1 slot#. (Will not expand if max has been reached. Can be used only once.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Used to expand your Character Slots in the #ccurrent world# by #c1 slot#. (Will not expand if max has been reached.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to change #cthe character name# on one character.\r\n\r\n#cYou cannot change again once the change is complete, and it cannot be used on characters who have changed their name before.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Use to expand the Character Slots on the #ccurrent server# by #c1 slot#. (Will not expand if max has been reached.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Changes the color of Kaiser's armor in his #cFinal Form#. Can only be used by a Kaiser during their 3rd Job Advancement.

string.name: desc
string.value: Changes the color of Kaiser's armor ornament in his #cFinal Form#. Can only be used by a Kaiser with their 4th Job Advancement

string.name: desc
string.value: Changes the color of Kaiser's armor in his #cFinal Form# to premium black. Can only be used by a Kaiser during their 3rd Job Advancement.

string.name: desc
string.value: Reverts the color of Kaiser's armor in his #cFinal Form# to its original color. Can only be used to revert to a Kaiser's original color if a color coupon has been used\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: desc
string.value: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Take this to change into a ghost for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to transform yourself into a ghost for 30 min. Greatly increases your speed and jump.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A tasty watermelon obtained from the Tasty Watermelon Pot. Better enjoy it before it goes bad!
#cDouble-click on it to obtain
an Alarm Clock (Right) and one of the following buffs:
-Lv. 30 or below-
ATT/M. ATT +20
Weapon/Magic DEF+200
HP+500
-Lv. 31-70-
ATT/M. ATT +30
Weapon/Magic DEF +300
HP +1000
-Lv. 71 or higher-
ATT/M. ATT +40
Weapon/Magic DEF +400
HP +1500
Buffs can be stacked with other buffs, aside from additional watermelon buffs.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragrant box obtained by diligently filling out the Tasty Watermelon Farming Journal. Contains a Tasty Watermelon Necklace.\n#cYou can open it by double-clicking on it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A small piece among the pieces that formed the third piece of the Statue of Goddess.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruity sundae that will keep you cool in the summer heat. When consumed, it will increase the amount of EXP you gain based on your character level. #cThis item may be transferred between characters on the same account.#

Buffs can be stacked with other buffs, aside from additional watermelon buffs.#

string.value: A treasure chest that once belonged to the Pirate King. It is unknown what treasures lie inside.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to see what's inside.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful banana from Gaga. Its sweet scent tickles your nose. You can't consume more than 100 of them, and you can only consume them until November 12th.\n#cConsuming it will increase your EXP based on your character level.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Mimir's Well Water, prepared especially for Cannoneers. You can't consume more than 100 of them and you can only consume them until December 20th.\n#cWhen consumed by a Cannoneer, EXP will increase by 10% before level 50. From level 50 to 99, EXP will increase by 5%. It can't be consumed at level 100 or higher.#

string.value: Special Mimir's Well Water for all classes. You can drink it only until 2012/03/03. during the event period. Drinking this water will give you 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 and below, 5% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, 2% if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149, and 1% if you are Lv. 150 or higher.

string.name: desc
string.value: Takes you right to the Magical Halloween Tree. Unlimited use during the event period.

string.name: desc
string.value: A surprise box prepared to celebrate Halloween. No one knows what's inside, not even the person who packed it. Must be opened during the event.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of a broken mirror from the Center Hall.

string.name: desc
string.value: A spooky coupon. #cDouble-click# on it to use the #Witch's Broomstick# riding skill for #c7 days#, starting from today.

string.value: Fills you up with crazy Halloween magic. Increases EXP based on level. You can only eat 10 a day without your stomach exploding, and it will go back right after Halloween.

string.value: A box given to the ones who have defeated Ani as a reward. Open the box to obtain various scrolls. However, those who are Lv. 140 or higher cannot obtain scrolls.

string.value: A lucky bonus item that gets you additional points in the Mu Lung Dojo Hard Mode.

string.name: desc
string.value: Chocolate with a message of love engraved on the surface. Depending on your level, ATT, M. ATT, and Speed will increase when consumed. Unfortunately, it melts after one day.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely gift box to celebrate Valentine's Day. Double-click to see what's inside. Careful, this can only be opened until 02/23/2016, when the event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: Marble containing the sun's energy. Collect 10 and #cdouble-click# to create one Sunburst.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box containing a Valentine's Day gift. Double-click to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box containing a mysterious treasure. Double-click to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift box given to newly reborn Dual Blades. Open to receive Pendant of the Spirit (30-Day), Dual Blade, Reborn medal, and a cash item called Owl Effect. However, be warned that the box will disappear if not used within one week.

string.name: desc
string.value: Device that shows you an earthquake's epicenter. Double-click it to scan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweet candy filled with love. Consume it to obtain EXP. Since it's TOO sweet, you can only eat up to 5 a day. Cannot be used once the event period is over.

string.name: desc
string.value: White Day gift box with a cute ribbon. Open it to receive your White Day gift! Cannot be used once the event period is over.

string.name: desc
string.value: Luxurious-looking box that contains a scroll. Cannot be used once the event period is over.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special cheer given to newly reborn Dual Blades. Increases Max HP/MP for 30 minutes. Higher the level, higher the amount increased, and can be stacked with other buffs. It does not disappear from the inventory after use. Can be used as much as desired during the event period at 30-minute intervals.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter sent to you by an anonymous admirer in lieu of White Day. You can feel how much love was put into it...maybe you should open it...

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift box given by #cMatilda#k, manager of Premium PC Cafe. Can only be received once a day. Not even Matilda knows what's inside. \n#cDouble-click# to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Panda Mount] for 1 year.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Panda Mount] for 15 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hilla's treasured pet, Blackheart, sleeps within this box. #cDouble-click# to obtain [Pet] Blackheart or Blackheart's Earrings.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect 10 to make an Nebulite Diffuser.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to teleport to the desired town, no matter the continent. Disappears 3 hours after the receipt. #cCan be used once every 30 minutes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Evil Spirit Box obtained after defeating Ergoth. It feels like useful items will be inside. However, it must be opened by the midnight of 8/13/2014.\r\n#cDouble-click to open.# \r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Box from the 3!3!3! event.\n#cDouble-click to open.#\nMust be opened by 06/02/15.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gold box from the 3!3!3! event.\n#cDouble-click to open.#\nMust be opened by 06/02/15.

string.name: desc
string.value: A legendary elixir of power. Take a sip to gain a level.\n#cMaximum-level characters cannot benefit from this item.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Memo that has the Mustache Factory's phone number and the order number.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gachapon item. Use it with the Perfect Evolving Belt II in your possession to add potentials!

string.name: desc
string.value: A dusty old box from the back of Spielgelmann's Antiques Roadhouse. Valuable items await.\n#cDouble-click to open.#\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Who knows how much this thing could be worth...

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Crimson Nightmare Mount] skill for 1 year.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Crimson Nightmare Mount] skill for 15 days.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Magical dust dropped by the Rhinojinn. It's so magical that it just might give you a lot of Artifact Points at once!

string.name: desc
string.value: 7-day Balrog mount coupon. Double-click to to learn the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: 7-day Orange Mushroom mount coupon. Double-click to to learn the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: 7-day Yeti mount coupon. Double-click to to learn the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A sweet potion made from Maple Syrup. Your level will determine how much HP and MP are restored. Not affected by potion related skills or potentials.
#cBelow Lv. 30: HP/MP +100
Lv. 30 - 69: HP/MP +300
Lv. 70 - 99: HP/MP +1000
Lv. 100 - 119: HP/MP +2000
Lv. 120 - 149: HP/MP +3000
Lv. 150 or higher: HP/MP +4000

string.name: desc
string.value: The Cannoneers are back in business! Increases Weapon Attack, Speed, and Jump for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift from beyond the stars for returning Legends. Allows you to teleport to any town, no matter the continent. Due to its fragile cellular structure, it implodes 24 hours after being touched. #cCan be used once every 30 minutes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Eight wonderful years, all summed up on one little card. Double-click to obtain massive EXP boosts, depending on your level.\n#cHas no effect on max level characters. Can be used until 06/30/13, the end of the event.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box brimming with 8th Maple Birthday gifts. Double-click to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to learn [Double Maximus Mount] for 30 days from today.\nYou can use Jag Jump on this mount even if you don't have the skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to learn [Double Red Truck Mount] for 30 days from today.\nYou can use Jag Jump on this mount even if you don't have the skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to learn [Double Power Suit Mount] for 30 days from today.\nYou can use Jag Jump on this mount even if you don't have the skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: The legendary Mercedes is rocketing back to the spotlight! Increases Weapon Attack and Max HP for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Demon Slayer is blazing back onto the scene! Increases Weapon Attack and Demon Fury for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ripe maple fruit. Double-click to obtain special gifts.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to get a random number between 1 and 10, then match them up with Spiegelmann's number to... win or something! Who knows? It's a mystery!\n#cCan be used until 06/30/13, the end of the event.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The evil hip-hop super squad, De La Meow, has taken over Kerning City's back alleys! Take those ruckus making hooligans down! \nDouble-click to travel to Funkmageddon Alley, where they were last spotted busting illicit rhymes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The evil hip-hop super squad, De La Meow, has taken over Kerning City's back alleys! Take those ruckus making hooligans down! \nDouble-click to travel to Krunkpocalypse Alley, where they were last spotted busting illicit rhymes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift box to celebrate the 8th anniversary.\n#cContents will disappear after 07/24/13!#

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value:
Awesome coupon given to those that log into Maple World every day.

#cDouble-click to obtain the following effects:
Lv. 30 or lower
Weapon/Magic Attack: +20
Lv. 31 - 70
Weapon/Magic Attack: +30
Lv. 71 or higher
Weapon/Magic Attack: +40

 Stacks with other Non-Daily buffs.#

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A special capsule for the Resistance. Can be moved into storage and given to another character. The capsule will expire once the event has ended.\n#cSwallowing this capsule will give you 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 and below, 5% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, and 2% EXP if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149. Cannot be used if you're under Lv. 10 or if you're Lv. 150 or higher (Cygnus Lv. 120).#

It will reward you with Gaga's Tasty Watermelon when it's fully grown!

However, you can't receive anything from the tree after the event ends.

string.value: A black dragon badge box. Its contents are unknown. \n#cDouble-click on it to check what's inside. However, it can only be opened until 2012/12/31.

string.name: desc
string.value: Spiegelmann's jewelry box containing a random Jewel-Studded Epaulette.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini-Sun Badge box. What could be inside? \n#cDouble-click to open during the New Year's Event.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A feather that can upgrade Maple Beryl Equipment to Crimson Maple Equipment with additional potential. You must have 1 empty slot in your Equip Inventory.\r\n#cShoulders cannot gain potential, and previous potential on the Beryl equipment will disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A feather that has 40% chance of upgrading Maple Beryl Equipment to Crimson Maple Equipment with additional potential. You must have 1 empty slot in your Equip Inventory.\r\n#cShoulders cannot gain potential, and previous potential on the Beryl equipment will disappear if successful.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This feather has an 80% chance of upgrading Maple Amethysian Equipment to Grand Maple Amethysian Equipment with additional potentials. You must have 1 empty slot in your Equip Tab.\r\n#cCurrent potential and upgrades will disappear upon successful enhancement.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that turns a weapon into a Soul Weapon, which grows in strength by absorbing the Soul Orbs of enemies.nWeapon Attack (ATT) and Magic Attack (M.ATT) can increase up to 10%, depending on the amount of absorbed Orbs.nCan only be used on Lv

null.name: . 100 or higher weapons that are fully upgraded.nSuccess Rate: 10%

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip armors that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack# #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Cap, shoulder accessory, clothes, pants, outfit, mantle, gloves, belt, shoes#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip weapons that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack# #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. Can only be used on equipment.\n#c Available slots: Weapon, shield, secondary weapon#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip accessories that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack# #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Pendant, ring, eye accessory, face, earrings, pocket#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip ETC equipment that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack# #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Medal, badge, dragon, Mechanic equipment#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip armors that are #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Cap, shoulder accessory, tops, bottoms, outfits, capes, gloves, belt, shoes#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip weapons that are for #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. Unable to use on the items that cannot be equipped/removed.\n#c Available slots: Weapon, shield, secondary weapon#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip accessories that are for #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Pendant, ring, eye accessory, face accessory, earrings, pocket#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip ETC equipments that are #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Medal, badge, dragon, Mechanic equipment#

string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to randomly increase or decrease stat ranks.

string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats. Has a higher chance of granting better stats than regular Star Dust. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to randomly increase or decrease stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Solidifies the effects of Star or Supernova Dust by locking the Core's current stats for 7 days. Cosmic Dust Solidifier can only be used to lock the current configuration once.\r\n\r\n#cWarning: The stat lock will be overwritten if you use an item to reconfigure the Core's stats.#

It is only available during the event.\n#c20% EXP if you're below Lv. 50, 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, and 2% EXP if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149. 1% EXP for Lv. 150 and above. string.value: Alchemy Masters and Renowned Masters can make this potion that increases your boss damage when attacking by 10% for 40 minutes. \n#cCaution:#\nNormally, only 1 Potion can be used at a time, but Alchemists can use 2 if they are of different types. Cooldown is 60 minutes.

string.value:

More successes increase the chance of a good enhancement.
The item is destroyed upon failure. Cannot be used on 15-star+ items.

1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10 successes: 10%
11+ successes: 5% or lower

string.name: desc
string.value: Resets all stats on an item, except for Hidden Potentials. Can only be used on equipment. If used on an item that grows, the item may revert to its pre-growth state. \nCannot be used on items touched by #cScissors of Karma, Sharing Tag, or Item Guard#. Resets additional stats and Scissor uses. Items that aren't eligible for Scissors will not have their trade status reset.

string.name: autodesc
string.value:
#cSuccess Rate: 100%
Can only be used on Carlton's Mustache.
Resets upgrade count.
#

string.name: desc
string.value: Reverts upgrade count on Carlton's Mustache to original.#cCan only be used once per item.#

string.name: name
string.value: Scroll for Carlton's Mustache for Upgrade Count Reset

string.name: desc
string.value: Resets all stats on an item, except for Hidden Potentials. Can only be used on equipment. If used on an item that grows, the item may revert to its pre-growth state. \nCannot be used on items touched by #cScissors of Karma, Sharing Tag, or Item Guard#. Resets additional stats and Scissor uses. Items that aren't eligible for Scissors will not have their trade status reset.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by Mr. Do to make anyone smarter.\n#c*Warning: Drink at your own risk.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by Mr. Do to cure all ailments.\n#c*Warning: Drink at your own risk.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Changes your appearance to that of sheep.#c* Warning: While transformed, your Speed is the same as a sheep.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into Hilla for 10 minutes.\n#c* Warning: You cannot climb ladders or ropes while transformed.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into Magnus for 10 minutes.\n#c* Warning: You cannot climb ladders or ropes while transformed.#

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A black magnet that is carved out of a magical stone found near Kritias. #cDouble-click it near Frozen Anxieties with low HP to steal Frozen Arrows from them.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A rope used to capture all sorts of things, like a tired viking.

string.name: desc
string.value: 50% chance of increasing the Master Level of #cBig Bang# to 30.\nJob: Bishop\nCondition: Skill Level 15+

string.name: desc
string.value: This rope is used for catching scorpions in the Ariant Scorpion Catch Tournament.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rope used to capture a tired Panda.

string.name: desc
string.value: A paper box that is used to box exhausted Panda Teddies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Herr gave you this empty bottle. Use it to contain the flow of time.

string.name: desc

string.value: Double-click on it to use the [Floaty Balloon] riding skill for 2 hours.\n#cEverybody in Event edition.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you tired? Try the only energy drink with the refined essence of bear, Bear Power! Restores 50 Fatigue. Cooldown is 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you tired? Try this new drink--a mixture of Red Moo and Vita-C! Super Moo! Restores 30 Fatigue. Cooldown is 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Raises 1 Profession at Level 9 or below to the next level.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret box sold by Rebecca.\n#cDouble-click# to receive 1 of many consumable or ETC items.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to acquire a Buff Item appropriate to your level range.

string.value: A pouch from Murgoth. You can get a Soul Shard from here if you're lucky. Pouch can't be used after the event.

string.value: A pouch from Murgoth. You can get a Soul Shard from here if you're lucky. Pouch can't be used after the event.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click it to acquire 9th Anniversary Coins. You won't know how many until you open it, which you should do before 06/10/2014.

-Clean Slate Scroll 10%
-Gold Awakening Stamp 80%
-Advanced Equip Enhancement Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: A special buff that is cast by Maple World's symbol maple leaf. Increases Weapon/Magic ATT for 30 minutes. Can be used in conjunction with other buffs.\r\n\r\n #cThis buff provides more powerful effects for the Explorer classes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: You've received this ticket as a reward for the Rainbow event. The evil hip-hop super squad, De La Meow, has taken over Kerning City's back alleys! Take those ruckus making hooligans down! \nDouble-click to travel to Funkmageddon Alley, where they were last spotted busting illicit rhymes.

A special buff to celebrate the coming of RED. Can be used on the opening day until midnight.#c
Weapon/Magic ATT +10
Speed and Jump bonuses
Duration: 30 minutes
Cooldown: 30 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value:
A cold, transparent cube of ice with a mysterious-looking letter frozen within. #cDouble-click# it to receive a random item. This can only be opened until 11:59 p.m. on December 23, 2013

#c<Available Items>
- RED Coin
- Chaos Scroll 60%
- Strawberry Popsicle
- Chocolate Popsicle
- Watermelon Popsicle
- Melon Popsicle
- Unidentified Love Letter
- Trait items
- Reindeer Milk
- Sunrise Dew

- Pinky hula hoop

Grants the #cMore powerful Pink Bean skill and bonus Potential# to #cweapons under the effects of a Soul Enchanter#.
#cSuccess: 100%#
Can be used on Lv 100+ equipment and you will be given 1 bonus potential.

string.name: autodesc
string.value:
#cSuccess Rate: 100%
Enchant your Soul Weapon with a monster soul.
#

string.name: desc
string.value: This Miracle Cube supposedly brings out the hidden potential in equipment, but... it emits a dark energy. Rumors say it might even #cLOWER# the potential tier... Is that really true? \n#cCan only be used on items from Rare to Unique# \n#cMax Result: Unique #

string.name: desc
string.value: This Miracle Cube supposedly brings out the hidden potential in equipment, but it reeks of dark energy.\n#cCan only be used on items from Rare to Epic# \n#cMax Result: Epic#

string.name: desc
string.value: This Miracle Cube supposedly brings out the hidden potential in equipment, but it reeks of dark energy.\n#cCan only be used on items from Rare to Epic# \n#cMax Result: Epic#

string.name: desc
string.value: This Miracle Cube resets your weapon's Potential. It's emanating the power of time since it was found in the Dimensional Schism...\n#cCan only be used on items from Rare to Unique# \n#cMax Result: Unique #

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious cube, said to bring out the hidden potential of equipment. \n#cOnly usable on items graded Rare to Unique# \n#cMax Result: Unique#

string.name: desc
string.value: A miraculous cube that resets the potential of a piece of equipment. Has a greater chance of raising equipment rank higher than the Master Craftsman's Cube. \n#cOnly usable on items from Rare to Legendary.# \n#cMax Result: Legendary #

string.name: desc
string.value: Sever the bond between an item and the original owner to allow for trade. This item can only be used on certain items and cannot be used on sealed items.

string.value: (Party Quest Item)\nFresh milk squeezed out of a reindeer. Tastier than it sounds.\nRecovers 5000 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: (Party Quest Item)\nDew collected in the early morning. Recovers 4000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful drink to satisfy powerful thirst! You're sure to make a powerful #cHmm Face# when you drink it. \n#cRecovers 300 HP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The most popular soda around Hannam. Drinking such a cool soda will give you a #cGleaming Face#. \n#cIncreases Magic ATT by 5 for 3 min.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Fresh fruit juice made from fresh oranges. The refreshing taste will put a #cSparkling Face# on your... face. \n#cRecovers 2000 HP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Lady Spring Bunny made this rice cake herself. That means she'll have very beautiful daughters. Really.\nRecovers about 1500 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A dish of 30 Spring Bunny Flower Rice Cakes.\nRecovers about 3000 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet nut roasted perfectly to its core. Some call this a honey nut because of its sweetness.\n#cRecovers 3000 HP and 3000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet potato roasted to its core. High in fiber and tasty to boot.\n#cRecovers 5000 HP and 5000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Delicious sushi roll with a lot of filling. Guaranteed to give you a #cSparkling Face#. \n#cRecovers 4,050 MP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Freshly made sandwich. Guaranteed to give you a #cGleaming Face#. \n#cRecovers 800 MP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Chewy fish cakes. Guaranteed to give you a #cKissy Face#.. \n#cRecovers 1,000 HP and MP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Butter roasted corn. Guaranteed to give you a #cHmm Face#.\n#cRecovers 2,000 HP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Tempting fruit candy with a sparkling sugar coating. Guaranteed to give you a #cSmitten Face#. \n#cRecovers 2,000 MP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Fresh baked rice cake sticks, cooked extra hot. Guaranteed to give you a #cTear-Streak Face#. \n#cRecovers 4,000 HP.#

string.name: name
string.value: Spicy Rice Cakes in a Cup

string.name: desc
string.value: Delicious spicy rice cakes in a cup. Guaranteed to give you an #cExcited Face#. \n#cRecovers 5,000 HP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Extra spicy rice cake skewers. Guarnateed to give you a #cBurnt Tongue Face#. \n#cRecovers 1,000 HP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The most reliable snack on the battlefield. Once you get past how tough and bland it is, it'll fill you right up!\nRecovers 1000 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Goes perfect with hardtack. It's also pretty hard, but in a sweet and crunchy sorta way. \nRecovers 1000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: This delicious, festive Ice Cream Pop looks extremely filling! \nRecovers 3000 HP and 3000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hungry? Don't wait, cram a Chortles Bar in your face! It's full of nutrients that will keep you full. Like chocolate. The sweet taste will give you a #cKissy Face#. \n#cRecovers 1000 HP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet and savory bar chock full of peanuts. Great for a meal on the go! The delicious taste will leave you with a #cSmitten Face#. \n#cRecovers 5000 HP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: An excellent dish, similar to calamari. Just don't think too hard about what's in it. \n#cRecovers 500 HP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Who would have guessed that Cold Eye tails can be used for spicy soup? Only a master chef can dream up something like this! \n#cRecovers 1000 HP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this lip gloss could make you more attractive. It says, 'Property of Mercedes, Queen of the Elves. Those who dare lay hands on this will suffer a terrible fate.' Are you sure you should have this?\n#cCharm +300#

string.name: desc
string.value: An espresso often enjoyed by Shade. The extremely bitter taste can be disconcerting at first, but a couple sips later, you will find yourself absorbed in sentimental feelings.\n#cEmpathy +300#

string.name: desc
string.value: Hand lotion belonging to the master thief himself, Phantom, who boasts nimble hands faster than lightning. The magical power in this lotion rapidly increases your Diligence.\n#cDiligence +300#

string.name: desc
string.value: An energy drink occasionally enjoyed by Aran. The nutritional facts list a bunch of ingredients good for you, such as mugwort, garlic, snake, ox tail, and eel bone. It'll probably boost your energy and your Will, but it will probably... not taste so good.\n#cWill +300#

string.name: desc
string.value: A hot, steaming potato packed in cloth by Evan's mother. This delicious and nutritious snack is one of Evan's favorite foods. Eating this will likely clear your head and raise your insight, so go on and enjoy!\n#cInsight +300#

string.name: desc
string.value: Hair spray responsible for Luminous's voluminous hair. Using it will immediately raise your charisma, possibly making you Maple World's next heartthrob. Using too much can damage the environment, so use it in moderation.\n#cAmbition +300#

string.value:
Von Bon's Soul Crystal. 
Grants the #cVon Bon skill and bonus Potential# to #cweapons under the effects of a Soul Enchanter#.
#cBonus Potential: Weapon ATT +5
Success: 100%#
Can be used on Lv 75+ equipment.

string.name: autodesc
string.value:
#cSuccess Rate: 100%
Enchant your Soul Weapon with a monster soul.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Spring is here! To celebrate, here's 
 a special gift. Open it at Lv.30 to get 
 some gifts, at Lv.50 to get a little 
 extra, or at Lv.90 to get even more.

string.name: desc
string.value: Thank you for celebrating our 9th anniversary with us! Here is a special gift.

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll get more rewards if you open this box at higher levels. Levels 30, 70, and 100 are the tiers for everyone. There's a special tier at Lv.50 and above for Dual Blades, Cannoneers, Evan, Mercedes, Phantom, Luminous, Battle Mages, Wild Hunters, and Mechanics.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare coupon good for one Succubus Android and one Beaded Heart.

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds a Zero weapon to the Maple Black Set.

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds a Zero weapon to the Maple White Set.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A mysterious cube, said to bring out the hidden potential of equipment. 
#cOnly usable on items graded Rare to Unique# 
#cMax Result: Unique# 
#cUsable only for equipment Lv.99 or below# 
#cMakes equipment untradeable#

string.name: desc
string.value: This person's got the virus! If they don't get a vaccine within 30 minutes, they'll start turning undead. #cCan be cured with any vaccine.

string.name: desc
string.value: This zombie is raging out, making them faster and stronger! #cIf they don't get the right vaccine within 10 minutes, they'll become a vector.

string.name: desc
string.value: This zombie fights 'till it drops.! #cIf they don't get the right vaccine within 10 minutes, they'll become a vector.

string.name: desc
string.value: This zombie's skin turned hard as a rock! #cIf they don't get the right vaccine within 10 minutes, they'll become a vector.

string.name: desc
string.value: Eww, this rotting zombie smells terrible! #cIf they don't get the right vaccine within 10 minutes, they'll become a vector.

string.name: desc
string.value: This person looks normal, but spreads the zombie virus to everyone around them! #cThey can only be cured with the Source Vaccine.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cures Infected, those with the zombie virus who HAVEN'T become a zombie yet.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calms and cures Hothead zombies. Can also cure normal Infected.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pacifies and cures Clobber zombies. Can also cure normal Infected.

string.name: desc
string.value: Softens and cures Slab zombies. Can also cure normal Infected.

string.name: desc
string.value: Heals and cures Oozer zombies. Can also cure normal Infected.

string.name: desc
string.value: Made from the source of the virus, this vaccine can cure any stage of the infection.

string.name: desc
string.value: A horrible virus that turns people into undead abominations. Disguised as a meso.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special gift for the Reply Maple Warriors Event.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Blood damage skin. \r\n#cOnce used, it will be permanently applied until another skin is applied.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: A Zombie damage skin. \r\n#cOnce used, it will be permanently applied until another skin is applied.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely yellow bloom easily found scattered throughout the plains.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pretty pink flower easily found scattered throughout the plains.

string.name: desc
string.value: An elegant yellow bloom easily found scattered throughout the forest.

string.name: desc
string.value: The long, narrow leaf of a lily, easily found scattered throughout the forest.

string.name: desc
string.value: The shape of this lovely flower is reminiscent of a bell. It can be easily found scattered throughout forests and near water.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rather ordinary-looking leaf, easily found scattered throughout forests and near water.

string.name: desc
string.value: A round clump of green algae that looks soft but has surprisingly little give when you poke it. It's often found floating in rivers, soaking up the sun.

string.name: desc
string.value: The white flower of a crassula plant. These plants are usually found in rocky areas or mountain meadows.

string.name: desc
string.value: The thick, succulent leaf of a crassula plant. \r\nThese plants are known for their ability to purify the air.

string.name: desc
string.value: The head of the plant looks like dark green flowers. They're found under rocks in the plains. \r\nContains a ton of vitamins.

string.name: desc
string.value: These red-capped mushrooms grow under rocks. Dry them and then boil them to make their toxins into a usable poison.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mushroom with what almost appear to be deer antlers on them. They're found near trees.

string.name: desc
string.value: Round, and almost ball-like. Look a little closer, and you'll see these flowers have a cotton candy-like softness.

string.name: desc
string.value: These lively blooms are famous throughout Maple World. They look warm but smell like rotting flesh.

string.name: desc
string.value: These curious flowers look like miniature Lupins from Ellinia! They grow on top of trees, just like monkeys!

string.name: desc
string.value: The leaf of a pink bean plant. The beans from this plant looks like Pink Bean.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruit that looks like Pink Bean, a creature form another world. Stir fry it to make it sweet.

string.name: desc
string.value: These plants are known to produce sweet scents that attract insects. Touch it gently and you just might free a bug that was trapped inside!

string.name: desc
string.value: The reddish fruit that grows on a Bellflower. It kind of looks like ginseng.

string.name: desc
string.value: The memorable bitter taste of this root might actually be very, very good for your health!

string.name: desc
string.value: The bee bee tree looks like like the monster Rash from Leafre. Its fruit kind of looks like a chestnut.

string.name: desc
string.value: The bee bee tree looks like like the monster Rash from Leafre. It's leaves don't seem very useful.

string.name: desc
string.value: Carrot Slimes are usually found near water. Their leaves are edible but not very tasty.

string.name: desc
string.value: These roots are round and soft. They're supposed to be amazing for your skin.

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks sort of like the bloom atop the Flower Fish at Aqua Road. Not much to write home about, to be honest.

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks sort of like the fins of the Flower Fish at Aqua Road. Can be stir-fried and eaten, but be warned, it's quite fishy.

string.name: desc
string.value: This fruit looks soft, warm, and cozy. Can be used like a sort of cotton.

string.name: desc
string.value: Found in rocky areas. Dry them out and make tea! It'll taste like soup.

string.name: desc
string.value: These large leaves are perfect for shading you from the sun.

string.name: desc
string.value: This brightly colored fruit is like a golden lotus banana! Right?

string.name: desc
string.value: Just looking upon this beautiful blossom seems to purify your spirit and uplift your soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: These wide, green leaves have a pleasant scent. Perfect to be used for cooking or to drink as tea.

string.name: desc
string.value: The petals of this delicate bloom turn transparent when they get wet!

string.name: desc
string.value: These large, cheery flowers adore the sunshine.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sunflower leaves aren't really very useful.

string.name: desc
string.value: This flower grows on the horns of an Alpine Goat. A valuable specimen for the ongoing research taking place at Spring Valley.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alpine Birds love to adorn themselves with this pretty bloom. A valuable specimen for the ongoing research taking place at Spring Valley.

string.name: desc
string.value: The otters of Spring Valley love this fruit. A valuable specimen for the ongoing research taking place at Spring Valley.

string.name: desc
string.value: Extracted from the wings of a Spring Valley butterfly. A valuable specimen for the ongoing research taking place at Spring Valley.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Today is super lucky... according to that fortune you pulled out of the ice!

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll be super strong today... according to that fortune you pulled out of the ice!

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll be super healthy today... according to that fortune you pulled out of the ice!

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll be super quick today... according to that fortune you pulled out of the ice!

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of lead, melted and then re-solidified in water. Careful inspection reveals writing you could learn from. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of lead, melted and then re-solidified in water. Careful inspection reveals riches sealed inside. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of lead, melted and then re-solidified in water. Careful inspection reveals Spell Traces sealed inside. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of lead, melted and then re-solidified in water. Careful inspection reveals a Power Elixir sealed inside. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: The fortune-telling pig said oink to you! Looks like a good day to make some money.\r\n#cMeso drop rate increased 50% for 1 hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Great Fortune Box from the Sky

string.name: desc
string.value: A box filled with fantastic fortunes, granted from the heavens themselves in honor of completing Yu Rang's request. #cDouble-click to open the box.

string.name: desc
string.value: This glacial shard holds a fortune. Keep it warm with your body heat for 30 minutes to melt it and get the fortune inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scrap of paper with a fortune written on it. It was sealed in ice, so it's still damp. #cDouble-click to read the fortune.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box specially made for Valentine's Day. Contains a random gift.

string.name: desc
string.value: Jelly Bean Damage Skin. \r\n#cOnce used, it will be permanently applied until another skin is applied.

string.name: desc
string.value: Donut Damage Skin. \r\n#cOnce used, it will be permanently applied until another skin is applied.

string.name: desc
string.value: Soft Serve Damage Skin. \r\n#cOnce used, it will be permanently applied until another skin is applied.

string.name: desc
string.value: Changes to the damage skin of the Couples Army! \r\n#cOnce used, it will be permanently applied until another skin is applied.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can almost feel the springtime breeze from this damage skin.#cOnce used, it will be permanently active until another skin is applied.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Your very own Rainbow Boom Damage Skin. \r\n#cOnce used, it will be permanently applied until another skin is applied#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use to get 1 to 5 Gold Dragon Soul Shards. Will fortune favor you?

string.name: desc
string.value: Use to get 1 to 5 Red Tiger Soul Shards. Will fortune favor you?

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragment of Gold Dragon's soul. Collect #c10# to trade for a proper Gold Dragon Soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragment of Red Tiger's soul. Collect #c10# to trade for a proper Red Tiger Soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: An egg boiled with tea leaves. It's salty and delicious. \nRecovers about 2000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pair of kebabs with a distinctive taste and chewy texture.\nRecovers about 3000 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: An egg pancake filled with meat, veggies, and delicious sauce. Yum, yum! \nRecovers about 2000 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fruit on a stick, covered with syrup. A nutritious, sweet and sour treat! \nRecovers about 3000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that returns you to the beautiful Yu Garden. The scroll can only be used while in The Far East. It will disappear once used.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores previously lost upgrade slots. Cannot be used on cash items.

string.name: autodesc
string.value:
#cSuccess Rate: 1%
Chance to destroy item on failure: 2%
Restores 1 previously lost upgrade slot
#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A scroll that summons a Diabolic Jiangshi. #c
*Caution*
Use at your own peril.
Cannot be used near portals, in town, or any maps where Teleport and Summon are prohibited.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by the Suspicious Alchemist. It will turn you into a jiangshi for 10 minutes when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by the Suspicious Alchemist. It will turn you into a Diabolic Jiangshi for 10 minutes when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this Red Bean Porridge on a jiangshi to make it run away.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ginseng soaked in boiling water with garlic and red bean, then twisted with talismans until formed into a rope. Used to capture jiangshi.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cFung Hak On# wrote this Jiangshi Eradication Talisman after collecting a fee from you. This will definitely work against the jiangshi!

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon allows you to change the look of a chosen outfit to the Diabolic Jiangshi Outfit.

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon allows you to change the look of a chosen headpiece to the Diabolic Jiangshi Hat.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to obtain a #cMr. Orlov Coin Sword#.

string.value:
Status : Jump +20, Speed +10

Increases Jump by 20 and speed by 10 for 1 hour.

string.name: comment
string.value: Let's see... You picked up #v2022216#... The fortune tells that your life seems to be easy going since you will be able to jump over the obstacles... Hey, if you are not satisfied with it, you can alwasys go for another round~

string.name: desc
string.value: \r\n Status: Weapon Attack +30, Magic Attack +30\r\nIncreases weapon and magic attack by 30 for 1 hour.

string.name: comment
string.value: Let's see... You picked up #v2022218#... The fortune tells that you will gain superior power soon. It will help you to take down some of the monsters... How do you like it? If you are not satisfied with it, you can always go for another round...

string.name: desc

Inceases avoidablility by 50 for 1 hour.

string.name: comment
string.value: Let's see... You have picked up #v2022218#. The fortune tells that your spirit is smart so that avoiding any risks ahead of you... How do you like it? If you are not satisfied, you can always go for another round~

string.name: desc
string.value: \r\n Status:Weapon Def.+ 30, Magic Def. +30\r\nIncreases weapon and magic defense by 30 for 1 hour.

string.name: comment
string.value: Let's see. You have picked up #v2022219#. The fortune tells that your protection ability is shining brightly. During certain period, you will be able to accomplish good result if you are on to something. How do you like it? If you are not satisfied, you can always go for another round~

Increases the accuracy by 50 for 1 hour.

string.name: comment
string.value: Let's see. You picked up #v2022220#. The fortune tells you will get what you are aiming for. So, be ambitious my mapler! How do you like it? If you are not satisfied, you can always go for another round.

string.name: desc

Increases the Max HP by 50% and Max Mp by 25% for 1 hour.

string.name: comment
string.value: Let's see. You picked up #v2022221#. The fortune tells that your future is bright! It seems that you will live longer than the others. How do you like it? If you are not satisfied, you can always go for another round.

string.name: desc

string.name: comment
string.value: Let's see. You picked up #v2022222#. The fortune tells that you will live a colorful life for a while, meaning that use your great skills and magics easier than the others. How do you like it? If you are not satisfied, you can always go for another round.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #cupgraded equipment#.
More successes increase the chance of a good enhancement.
The item is destroyed upon failure.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10+ successes: 10%
